title: Head, Customer Service Operations Job at Virtual Switch International
content:
At Virtual Switch International, we are at the forefront of powering the future. With a legacy spanning 7 years, we have established ourselves as a leading force in the power industry. Our commitment to innovation, sustainability, and reliability has driven us to excel in providing cutting-edge solutions to meet the world's growing energy needs.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Head, Customer Service Operations

Job Location: Abuja (FCT)

Description
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	As the Head of Customer Service Operations you will oversee and lead the company’s customer service department, ensuring the delivery of exceptional support experiences to customers across all touchpoints.
	This role is responsible for driving customer satisfaction, streamlining service processes, managing the service team, and ensuring alignment with the company’s strategic goals.


Key Responsibilities


	Lead and manage the daily operations of the customer service department, ensuring consistent and high-quality service delivery.
	Develop and implement customer service policies, procedures, and standards.
	Set performance targets for speed, efficiency, customer satisfaction, and quality, and monitor them through KPIs and dashboards.
	Coordinate with other departments (sales, marketing, IT, product development) to ensure a seamless customer journey.
	Develop strategies for continuous improvement of the customer service function, including automation and digital support tools (e.g. chatbots, CRM, etc.).
	Oversee the recruitment, training, and performance evaluation of customer service staff.
	Implement customer feedback mechanisms and ensure issues are escalated and resolved efficiently.
	Identify trends in customer inquiries, complaints, and behavior to inform business improvements.
	Manage customer service budgets, forecasts, and resource planning.
	Champion a customer-centric culture across the organization.


Educational Qualifications and Experience


	Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, Communications, Management, or a related field.
	Minimum of 6 –10 years of progressive experience in customer service or operations, with at least 3 years in a leadership or managerial role.
	Experience in fintech & e-commerce is preferred.
	A Master’s Degree (MBA or equivalent) is an added advantage.
	Demonstrated success in managing large customer service teams and implementing service improvement initiatives.


Key Skills and Competencies:


	Strong leadership and people management skills.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities.
	Strategic thinking with the ability to execute operational plans.
	Analytical mindset with proficiency in interpreting customer data and KPIs.
	High level of emotional intelligence and conflict resolution skills.
	Experience with CRM tools, ticketing systems, and digital communication channels.
	Ability to work in a fast-paced, target-driven environment.


Work Environment and Culture:


	Fast-growing and innovation-driven organization.
	Collaborative and performance-oriented team culture.
	Customer-obsessed, data-driven decision-making environment.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: humancapital@virtualswitch.org using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Social Media Manager Job at Professional Perfect Solutions
content:
Professional Perfect Solutions is an information technology company poised at building and managing voice solutions aimed at enabling your customers to reach you anywhere. Seasoned software engineers centered at developing customer driven software and integrating already developed software.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Manager

Job Location: Ajao Estate, Lagos
Employment Type: Part-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking for a Digital Marketing Officer to develop and implement digital marketing strategies and campaigns.
	The ideal candidate will have strong digital marketing skills, creativity, and the ability to drive engagement and conversions through various online channels.
	This role requires expertise in digital marketing tools, analytics, and content creation.


Responsibilities


	Develop and execute digital marketing strategies and campaigns to drive brand awareness, traffic, and engagement across digital channels, including websites, social media, email, and search engines.
	Create and curate content for digital marketing initiatives, including blog posts, social media posts, emails, videos, and graphics.
	Manage and optimize digital advertising campaigns, including pay-per-click (PPC) ads, display ads, and social media ads, to achieve campaign objectives and ROI targets.
	Monitor and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs), metrics, and analytics data to measure the effectiveness of digital marketing efforts and identify opportunities for improvement.
	Conduct market research, competitive analysis, and audience segmentation to inform digital marketing strategies and tactics.
	Collaborate with internal teams, including marketing, sales, and product development, to align digital marketing activities with business goals and objectives.
	Stay updated on digital marketing trends, tools, and best practices to ensure the organization remains competitive in the digital landscape.
	Optimize website content, user experience, and conversion funnels to improve online visibility, traffic, and conversion rates.
	Manage relationships with external vendors, agencies, and partners to support digital marketing initiatives and projects.
	Maintain accurate and organized records of digital marketing activities, budgets, and performance metrics.


Requirements and Qualifications


	Bachelor's Degree in Marketing, Digital Marketing, Communications, or related field.
	Proven experience in digital marketing, with a focus on digital strategy, content creation, and campaign management.
	Proficiency in digital marketing software, content management systems (CMS), and analytics tools.
	Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
	Strong understanding of digital marketing channels, platforms, and tools, including SEO, SEM, social media, email marketing, and analytics.
	Creative and analytical mindset, with the ability to develop innovative digital marketing solutions and measure their impact.
	Ability to multitask and prioritize tasks in a fast-paced environment.
	Adaptability and willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies and trends.
	Attention to detail and accuracy in work.
	Integrity and professionalism in representing the organization's brand and values.


Skills Required:


	Digital marketing strategy
	Content creation
	Campaign management
	Analytics
	Market research
	Collaboration
	Adaptability
	Communication
	Attention to detail
	Integrity.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should submit their Resume to: info@pps.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: Experienced Hotel Receptionist Job at Hotel Capitol
content:
Hotel Capitol is a modern and contemporary hotel that offers not only luxury but also comfort at its best. The three-star hotel is strategically located at the heart of Omole Phase 1, making it easily accessible with excellent road networks to other parts of the mainland and the city of Lagos as a whole. The 32-room Hotel offers tastefully furnished deluxe executive and super executive rooms as well as one- and two-bedroom luxury suites.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Experienced Hotel Receptionist
Job Location: Ojodu-Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Greet guests as they arrive and ensure they feel welcome.
	Checking guests in and out efficiently and accurately, following hotel procedures.
	Handling guest inquiries and providing accurate information about the hotel’s facilities, services, and local attractions.
	Resolving guest complaints and concerns promptly and effectively, escalating to management when necessary.
	Maintaining an orderly front desk area and lobby, ensuring cleanliness and organization at all times.
	Processing reservations by phone, email, or in person and ensuring all reservations are accurately recorded.
	Handling cash and credit card transactions accurately and efficiently, maintaining a balanced cash register.
	Collaborating with other hotel departments to ensure guests’ needs are met and special requests are handled appropriately.
	Keeping up-to-date with hotel policies, procedures, and promotions.


Skills and Qualifications


	Interested candidates should possess an HND / Bachelor's Degree with 2 years of experience.
	Previous experience in a customer service role, preferably in a hotel or hospitality environment.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
	Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.
	Ability to work effectively as part of a team as well as independently.
	Proficiency in computer systems such as MS Office, hotel management software and POS systems.
	Ability to handle multiple tasks simultaneously in a fast-paced environment.
	Flexibility to work various shifts, including weekends and holidays.
	Candidates should reside within Ojodu, Akute, Ogba, Iyana Ipaja, Ketu


Salary
N80,000 - N100,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: jobs@hotelcapitol.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: Human Resource Manager Job at Total Secure Nigeria Limited
content:

Also, we help examine all risk areas of your business and operations - both internally and externally of your business - which can impact your business’ value.

To help protect this value, we mitigates the four core risk areas that impact businesses: Hazard & Event Risk, training, Operational & Physical Risk, Market & Economic Risk, and Technology & Informational Risk. We offer physical security and defense products We design and manufacture innovations and market leading automatic physical security solutions
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Human Resource Manager
Job Location: Abuja
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	As the Human Resource Manager you will be responsible for developing, implementing, and managing HR strategies, policies, and practices that support the overall business goals.
	This role will oversee key HR functions including recruitment, employee relations, performance management, compensation and benefits, training and development, and compliance with labor laws.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and implement HR strategies aligned with the company’s vision and objectives.
	Lead the recruitment and onboarding process to ensure the company attracts and retains top talent.
	Manage employee relations and ensure a positive workplace culture through conflict resolution and communication strategies.
	Identify training needs and coordinate learning and development initiatives.
	Maintain and update HR records, reports, and documentation.
	Serve as a strategic advisor to management on HR-related matters.
	Develop and implement performance management systems and succession planning initiatives.
	Ensure legal compliance with labor and employment regulations in all HR practices and documentation.
	Design and administer compensation, benefits, and reward programs.
	Monitor HR metrics and prepare periodic reports for senior leadership.
	Manage disciplinary processes in line with company policies and best practices.


Education and Experience Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Human Resource Management, Business Administration, Industrial Relations, or related field.
	Minimum of 8 years of progressive HR experience, with at least 5 years in a managerial role.
	Master’s degree or HR professional certifications (e.g., CIPM, SHRM, PHR) is an added advantage.
	Experience in managing HR functions in a multi-unit or multi-location organization is preferred.


Required Skills and Competencies:


	Strong knowledge of employment laws and HR best practices.
	Excellent interpersonal and communication skills.
	Ability to lead and influence at all levels of the organization.
	Strong organizational and problem-solving abilities.
	High level of professionalism, integrity, and confidentiality.
	Competency in HR software, HRIS systems, and Microsoft Office Suite.
	Strategic thinking with hands-on execution capability.
	Conflict resolution and employee engagement skills.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: humancapital@totalsecureng.comusing the Job Position as the subject of the email.
